sentences.sContent: people who are fastidious about personal hygiene
sentences.sCn: 十分讲究个人卫生的人

synos.tran: 挑剔的；苛求的，难取悦的；（微生物等）需要复杂营养地

remMethod.val: fast (绝食) + idious ( = tedious， 乏味的) → 因乏味而绝食 → 挑剔的

trans.tranCn: 难取悦的； 挑剔的； 苛求的
trans.tranOther: very careful about small details in your appearance, work etc
